item.title: Kat add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Some day you will be old enough to start reading fairy tales again." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Kat add a quote by Arthur C. Clarke
item.description: "Two possibilities exist: either we are alone in the Universe or we are not. Both are equally terrifying." -- Arthur C. Clarke

item.title: Kat add a quote by Patrick Rothfuss
item.description: "My parents danced together, her head on his chest. Both had their eyes closed. They seemed so perfectly content. If you can find someone like that, someone who you can hold and close your eyes to the world with, then you're lucky. Even if it only lasts for a minute or a day. The image of them gently swaying to the music is how I picture love in my mind even after all these years." -- Patrick Rothfuss

item.title: Kat add a quote by Patrick Rothfuss
item.description: "If you can find someone like that, someone who you can hold and close your eyes to the world with, then you're lucky." -- Patrick Rothfuss

item.title: Kat add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "I suspect the truth is that we are waiting, all of us, against insurmountable odds, for something extraordinary to happen to us." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Kat add a quote by Jhumpa Lahiri
item.description: "That's the thing about books. They let you travel without moving your feet." -- Jhumpa Lahiri
